cards.question: What do I love more than anything?
cards.hint: My owner comes first but what do you do with me
cards.answer: Puppies love games such as hide and seek! Hide, then call your pup's name so she can try to find you.

cards.question: How many words can I learn?
cards.hint: In spanish the word is million

cards.question: What is the best way to show me love and affection?
cards.hint: My alltime favorite thing you can do to me besides play with me
cards.answer: Stroking dogs and gazing into their eyes releases the feel good hormone oxytocin for both people and dogs

cards.question: If I'm unhappy and cranky what do I need?
cards.hint: The best feeling in the world other than accomplished
cards.answer: Tired puppies get cranky just like little kids. If you have a fussy puppy, try nap time.

cards.question: How can you tell if I am happy?
cards.answer: Big happy Helicopter tail wagging is one sign of a really nice dog
